description:
Bonobono and Chipmunk go to visit their friend Chipmunk, but he isn`t in his hole. They find a dried-out and rolled-up leaf nearby and worry that Prairie Dog may also have been dried-out and rolled-up. They rush to find him, but still cannot find him and begin to worry that he has fallen in the river.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: プレーリードッグくんはどこ?
